docs.text: Conformal Floating Feature Selection Authors: Farnoosh Abbas-Aghababazadeh , Kewei Ni , Marcos López De Castro , Ruben Armañanzas Arnedillo Contact: farnoosh.abbasaghababazadeh@uhn.ca , kewei.ni@uhn.ca , mlopezdecas@unav.es , rarmananzas@unav.es Description: Conformal prediction–driven feature selection for accurate, interpretable models, with applications in immuno-oncology datasets. Set Up Prerequisites Pixi is required to run this project. If you haven't installed it yet, follow these instructions Installation Clone this repository to your local machine Navigate to the project directory Set up the environment using Pixi: pixi install Documentation Click here to view the full documentation.
